name: Flying Hamster II (Canceled)
blurb: A Full HD action-RPG platformer by\nGame Atelier: Newton is back and is now a keen swordfighter with transformation capabilities.

rewards.reward:
SUPPORTER
=============================
+DESKTOP WALLPAPER
============================= 
Thank you for your support! You will help us deliver a great game and will receive some awesome exclusive desktop and phone wallpapers.

EARLY ADOPTER
=============================
+THE GAME AT DISCOUNT PRICE!
============================= 
INCLUDES DESKTOP WALLPAPER 
Digital downloadable copy of Flying Hamster II: Knight of the Golden Seed for a smaller fee.

FLYING HAMSTER BACKER
=============================
+THE GAME
=============================
INCLUDES DESKTOP WALLPAPER
Digital downloadable copy of Flying Hamster II: Knight of the Golden Seed for the platform of your choice.

SINGING HAMSTER
=============================
+DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK
============================= 
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
Add to your loot a digital version of the game’s OST, including Kickstarter exclusive Bonus Tracks!

ARTY HAMSTER
=============================
+DIGITAL ART BOOK
============================= 
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
Get the digital artbook containing sketches, concept arts, characters profiles and many other illustrations to revive the development of Flying Hamster II.

COMPANION
=============================
+DLC UNLOCK: QUEST COMPANION
============================= 
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
You’ll have acces to the DLC to help in your quest: receive your permanent companion that will support you when you fight, find secret areas, heal you when you're down or automatically recover loot on the floor!

INSIDER HAMSTER
=============================
+VOTING PRIVILEGES
+ EARLY BETA ACCESS
+ DEV BLOG ACCESS
============================= 
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
You’ll gain access to the Beta version of the game and an access to the advanced developer blog with more detailed information on how we build the game. Last but not least you'll have the power to vote for many aspects of the game (story, levels, enemies, transformations or companion designs).
Power to the backers!

CREDITED PRODUCER
=============================
+YOUR NAME IN THE GAME’S CREDITS
============================= 
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
Get the chance to add your name to the game’s credits as a very important backer.

MUSIC LOVER
=============================
+PHYSICAL CD SOUNDTRACK
============================= 
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
Get the full game OST on a physical packaged CD, including Kickstarter exclusive Bonus Tracks, with exclusive cover artwork.

FASHIONABLE HAMSTER
=============================
+LIMITED EDITION T-SHIRT
============================= 
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
Receive an exclusive T-Shirt featuring a design that you will choose through a poll, and of course exclusive for backers!

TREASURE HUNTER
=============================
+PHYSICAL ART BOOK
============================= 
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
Get the wonderful art of Flying Hamster II including sketches, concept arts, characters profiles and many other illustrations in a gorgeous physical hard cover art book. A must have!

FINE ART COLLECTOR
=============================
+AN ORIGINAL SIGNED FLYING HAMSTER SKETCH
============================= 
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
Receive an original sketch from the official Flying Hamster II character designer. A true beautiful piece of history that one day could belong in a museum!

YOUR HAMSTER FACE
=============================
+YOUR NPC VILLAGER BASED ON YOUR FACE
============================= 
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
We’ll create a NPC villager based on your face. Check out our Core Team paragraph if you want to see few examples. Note that your NPC character may have a very important role in the Flying Hamster II story!

FLYING DESIGNER
=============================
+DESIGN A NEW ENEMY WITH US
============================= 
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
You’ll get it ALL! Plus you’ll be able to help our designers to create an enemy, and be credited as the creator of that character!

ULTIMATE HAMSTER
=============================
+DINE WITH US IN A REAL FRENCH CASTLE, ALL INCLUDED
============================= 
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
The ULTIMATE backer! All included flight and accomodations in Paris, and visit a castle with  us. Better than being the King of Goldseedia!
